answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.It's unlikely that there is any connection between the lymph node removal and her symptoms. But polydipsia (excessive oral fluids) is a symptom of Diabetes Mellitus. A simple blood test could help detect diabetes. Consult your primary care physician for this test.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.
